main event: Three bright red objects were observed in McKeesport, Pennsylvania on 3 November 1956.
interesting points: The objects were the size of a pin's head at arm's length., Approximately 25 witnesses observed the objects through binoculars for about 4 minutes., The objects maintained a westerly course with one leading the others., The sighting was reported by the Assistant Group Operations Staff Officer., Initial speculation suggested the objects might have been aircraft.
sighted object: three bright red objects in the sky
witness description: Various witnesses including Mr. Mur E. McKeesport, Gas Blocker at US Steel Corporation.
